entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
